meanings.definition: To awaken or stir up again.
meanings.sent1: The loud noise rearoused the sleeping dog.
meanings.sent2: The smell of fresh cookies rearoused my appetite.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected rain rearoused the excitement of the outdoor party.
meanings.sent4: The old photograph rearoused memories of childhood.
meanings.sent5: The sunrise rearoused the beauty of the landscape.

meanings.sent1: The surprise gift rearoused her interest in painting.
meanings.sent2: The music rearoused the crowd's enthusiasm.
meanings.sent3: The funny joke rearoused laughter in the room.
meanings.sent4: The victory rearoused the team's spirit.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh flowers rearoused memories of spring.
